raw_text:
Based on the provided paper content, I'll extract the structured information following the required format:

```json
{
  "paper_metadata": {
    "title": "Livestock Asset Transfers and the Livelihoods of the Ultra-poor in West Bengal, India",
    "matches_expected_title": "YES"
  },
  "program_information": {
    "program_name": "Targeting Hardcore Poor (THP)",
    "country": "India",
    "region": "West Bengal",
    "target_population": "Ultra-poor households, particularly women"
  },
  "intervention_components": {
    "component_a_cash_support": {
      "component_a_present": true,
      "cash_support_type": "weekly consumption allowance",
      "cash_amount": null,
      "cash_frequency": "weekly",
      "is_loan_or_credit": "NO",
      "cash_evidence_citation": "The intervention provided by the THP programme includes the provision of productive assets (mainly livestock) and other supports such as training, weekly consumption allowances, and health support to ultra-poor women"
    },
    "component_b_assets": {
      "component_b_present": true,
      "assets_provided": ["livestock"],
      "direct_provision": "YES",
      "assets_evidence_citation": "The programme provides the female members of ultra-poor households with livestock assets as grants"
    }
  },
  "study_characteristics": {
    "outcomes_measured": [
      "income/earnings",
      "food security/nutrition",
      "asset accumulation",
      "employment",
      "social cohesion",
      "housing",
      "sanitation",
      "women's empowerment"
    ],
    "outcomes_evidence_citation": "we estimate the effects of the intervention on employment, income, food security, productive and durable assets, social inclusion, housing, sanitation, and women's empowerment",
    "study_design": "Quasi-experimental (Propensity Score Matching)",
    "design_evidence_citation": "Using propensity score matching (PSM), we estimate the effects of the intervention",
    "is_review_or_policy_analysis": false,
    "publication_year": null,
    "study_conducted_year": "2017",
    "sample_size": null,
    "completed": true
  },
  "bonus_information": {
    "has_qualitative_components": false,
    "qualitative_methods": [],
    "qualitative_evidence_citation": null,
    "has_cost_data": false,
    "cost_mentions": null,
    "cost_evidence_citation": null
  },
  "evidence_citations": {
    "program_name_citation": "The programme titled Targeting Hardcore Poor (THP) has been implemented by a local NGO called Belghoria Janakalyan Samity (BJS)",
    "country_citation": "we examine the effects of a livestock-based anti-poverty programme on the livelihoods of the ultra-poor in West Bengal, India",
    "target_population_citation": "The THP programme targets ultra-poor households who are marginalised, severely food insecure, and have no entrepreneurial skills and productive assets"
  }
}
```
